constituent: spiny, tree, wood, grow late, Ameratasu, one, ceiling, sun, tucked under the arm
heisigStory: This character refers originally to a deciduous, rough tree that grows on mountain plains. From this it gets the secondary sense of rugged or spiny. Its primitive elements: tree . . . grow late.
koohiiStory1: I learned this one from the movie Evil Dead, but when it grows late, trees change shape and become spiny creatures! Lesson: don´t go out at night.
koohiiStory2: With the safety of darkness as it grows late, spiny little insects start crawling out of the trees.
kunYomi: ふさぐ、やまにれ、おおむね
myStory: cây có gai. mầm nhánh. cây lớn muộn.
